channel.title: [The Wild] Seeking experienced coder
channel.description:
I'm here to invite people for my new project. I pretend this project to be functionally working in 3 days. I am wanting to put all the skills in runescape as they are in real : -Fishing/Cooking -Wc/Firemaking/Fletching -Mining/Smithing -Magic/Rc -Thieving/Agi/Herblaw -Combat skills (ATT, DEF, STR, RNG, PRAY) -Probably Slaying and Farming. I can only say that i am introducing a slayer points system (if i do slayer), this means that when u slay a beast u get a special item that only slayer points give. The slayers points will be controlled by those black tokens whose i forgot the name, but anyways, the higher the beast u kill, more tokens u get.
If you are interested send an email to : pedro_issler@hotmail.com Tell me about your experience as a coder and as a server maker in mopar and I will contact you. Again, I plan this to be fast and with the only intent to make cash in RS2 (rivers of cash). Further explanation will be given as soon as we make contact.
End.

item.title: [The Wild] Seeking experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Wildwolf Wildwolf
item.description:
@Wildwolf wrote:

you are officially right, i know shit about mopar servers,
but… does it matter anyways? all i want to do its modify
actual servers to a state of no commands. Then I will workout some
stores and fishing and wcing spots into different towns. I will
make teleport cost 0 so people can move around easily.
Each town will have a different skill in which u can train on.
You can still buy wood at falador, but i can assure you that
buying into seers will be cheaper and easier.
Anyways, want to give it a try?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2007, 02:11:01 AM[/size][hr]but, i am fluent into php and html language, so i can make a site and advertise, i am not a minor also, like many of you, so i can pay a decent hoster.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Wildwolf wrote:

I’m here to invite people for my new project.
I pretend this project to be functionally working in 3 days.
I am wanting to put all the skills in runescape as they are in real :
-Fishing/Cooking
-Wc/Firemaking/Fletching
-Mining/Smithing
-Magic/Rc
-Thieving/Agi/Herblaw
-Combat skills (ATT, DEF, STR, RNG, PRAY)
-Probably Slaying and Farming.
I can only say that i am introducing a slayer points system (if i do slayer),
this means that when u slay a beast u get a special item that only slayer points
give. The slayers points will be controlled by those black tokens whose i forgot the
name, but anyways, the higher the beast u kill, more tokens u get.

If you are interested send an email to : pedro_issler@hotmail.com
Tell me about your experience as a coder and as a server maker in mopar
and I will contact you. Again, I plan this to be fast and with the only intent to
make cash in RS2 (rivers of cash). Further explanation will be given as soon as
we make contact.
